title: Mixed green leaves Parmesan salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '120g (4 1/2 oz) salad leaves of your choice, torn (see tip)', 'juice of 1 large lemon slice', '30g (1 oz) Parmesan Reggiano cheese, shaved']
